message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a starting price of $14,000. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high to me.  Could you do $13,000? It's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
